Rulings.Edison: ● When any monster is Summoned during its controller's turn, this card's effect can be activated with ignition priority.

Rulings.Cat: ● If an effect is chained to 'Destiny Hero - Malicous' so that there are no open Monster Card Zones when its effect resolves, the second copy of 'Destiny Hero - Malicious' can't be Special Summoned. It is destroyed and sent to the GY.

Rulings.Base: 1. If an effect is chained to "Destiny HERO - Malicious" so that there are no open Monster Card Zones when its effect resolves, the second copy of "Destiny HERO - Malicious" cannot be Special Summoned. It is destroyed and sent to the GY.
